description.data: Elevating whiskey to new heights, 1792 Bottled In Bond Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is an award-winning whiskey that is bold and traditional. 1792 bourbon is created at the oldest fully operating distillery in Bardstown, Kentucky, the heart of bourbon country. This distinctly different bourbon whiskey features an unmistakable flavor profile. Notes of charred oak and fresh mint along with subtle caramel apple tones are delicately balanced with the lingering essence of coffee and black pepper. The well-aged bourbon comes from only barrels filled during the same distilling season and is bottled at exactly 100 proof for a bold taste and lingering finish. Enjoy 1792 bourbon whiskey on the rocks, neat, or in your favorite whiskey cocktails, such as an old fashioned or Manhattan. Raise a glass to raised expectations with 1792 Bourbon Whiskey.

brandHighlight.data:
The oldest registered distillery in the United States is home to the world's best-selling individual whiskey brand. 

Jack Daniel’s, the best-selling individual whiskey brand in the world, was originally crafted by Jack Daniel himself. Jack Daniel’s premium Tennessee whiskey is still made using iron-free cave spring water, and is charcoal-mellowed and matured at America’s oldest registered distillery, established in 1866 in Lynchburg, Tennessee.

text.data: Ambient

description.data: El Jimador Reposado Tequila is full of warm, seasoned flavors. This el Jimador Tequila is made with 100% blue Weber agave and is naturally fermented and double distilled. It's then aged for two months in our own charred American white oak barrels. Experience the inviting aroma and flavor of vanilla, toasted wood, fruits and spices with smooth agave followed by a soft, long-lasting finish. Pour this tequila alcohol straight from the tequila bottle to enjoy in a shot, or use it in alcohol drinks such as a classic Margarita, a Tequila Sunrise or an Authentic Paloma cocktail. El Jimador Tequila Reposado has won over 25 awards since 2010 including the silver medal at the 2020 Tequila Mezcal Challenge and a 93-point rating at the 2021 Wine Enthusiast event. Please Drink Responsibly.

brandHighlight.data: PATRÓN tequilas are handcrafted at the Hacienda Patrón distillery in Jalisco, Mexico where people are the heart of the process - one that has remained the same since the very beginning. First, skilled jimadors uproot only the finest 100% Weber Blue Agave with the perfect sugar content and transport the heart of the plant to Hacienda Patrón. They’re then hand chopped, baked and crushed by a two-ton volcanic stone tahona wheel and a roller mill. The agave is then fermented in pine oak tanks and distilled in small batches using copper stills. Each bottle of PATRÓN is a work of art, meticulously inspected, hand corked and signed.

description.data: Experience an añejo tequila in a new light with PATRÓN Cristalino, an exceptionally sweet and velvety smooth crystal-clear tequila made from 100% Weber Blue Agave and natural ingredients.

tastingNotesText.data: Discover Añejo in a new light with PATRÓN Cristalino. Rooted in Mexican craftsmanship and tradition, PATRÓN Cristalino is handcrafted from slow-cooked, 100% Weber Blue Agave and natural ingredients to create the smoothest and sweetest Cristalino. Patrón Añejo is masterfully filtered through American oak to create a clear and crisp Cristalino tequila. Striking a harmonious balance, PATRÓN Cristalino tequila offers smooth notes of sweet caramel, creamy vanilla, and light oak. Enjoy it on the rocks with a charred lemon for a sophisticated sipping experience

text.data:
Only handcrafted Añejo creates the smoothest Cristalino taste
PATRÓN Cristalino is a celebration of our traditional artisinal and modern tequila mastery, ensuring the finest taste and shimmering clarity
PATRÓN Cristalino is crafted with the highest quality ingredients and craftsmanship achieving the smoothest Cristalino without any additives
Expertly made by hand, using our traditional method of crushing the finest oven-baked 100% Blue Agave with Volcanic Tahona stone to release all the sweet agave flavor, before twice distilling and aging in 4 types of oak barrels
Filter the bled through American Oak Charcoal for crystal clear tequila resulting in a tequila Cristalino with the smoothest and sweetest finish

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of spicy cinnamon.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky Peel & Party Shots. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is America’s #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

description.data: Encourage socialization with Dr. McGillicuddy’s Root Beer Liqueur. The root beer liqueur has a smooth, classic, root beer barrel taste with hints of nostalgia; whether you want to pregame before a night out, simmer down after you watch the big game with great company or simply want to kill your beer breath, this classic alcoholic beverage has your back. Each bottle of Dr. McGillicuddy’s Root Beer liqueur drinks has zero sugar and zero calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 21% alcohol, this root beer liqueur can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle for a classic root beer flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, these liqueur shots can be used in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages and mixed drinks. Doctor your favorite hard seltzer with a shot for a great tasting mixed drink. Use this root beer liqueur shot with the Doctor’s other liqueurs to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store Doctor McGillicuddy’s at room temperature or pour the spirits from your freezer for a chilled shot. Please drink responsibly.

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of hot spicy cinnamon. Live it, shoot it, what happens next is up to you. Tastes like heaven but the fire burn is hot and harsh. Red Hot! Why not make every Friday a Fireball Friday? Drink it straight as a shot or mix it up with pineapple juice, ginger beer and a squeeze of lime for a Fiery Mule! Literally the only thing you need to get your party started!

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky in this Fireball Party Pong Kit. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is America’s #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: Smooth flavor with a fiery kick that will definitely warm you up from the inside out

description.data:
Hartley is an imported VSOP Brandy is aged in oak casks for four years. The result is an elegant, superior brandy with a complex bouquet of flavor.  

Bright copper in color, Hartley VSOP delights with a rich aroma of fresh buttered rum cake that wafts through the nose. The palate is an opulent smorgasbord of rich fruits. Asian pear, orange peel and juicy apricots drizzled with vanilla shine brightly. The finish is clean and crisp leaving the senses refreshed.

description.data: Create cocktails like a master mixologist with Mr. Boston Peppermint Schnapps Liqueur. A clear mint-flavored spirit that is less sweet than creme de menthe, this peppermint schnapps liqueur is typically used in holiday cocktails, such as a peppermint martini, spiked peppermint hot chocolate or a Peppermint Stick. Mr. Boston Peppermint Schnapps is also an excellent cordial for adding a peppermint twist to traditional cocktails or using with other cordials in layered drinks. This 27% alcohol by volume peppermint schnapps liqueur is also the perfect strength for sipping on the rocks or as shots for a refreshing peppermint flavor. Mr. Boston, the trusted drinks authority since 1935, provides the highest quality spirits to make the best tasting cocktails for any occasion. Store Mr. Boston Peppermint Schnapps in a cool dry place until you’re ready to enjoy responsibly.

brandHighlight.data: In 1773, the McAfee Brothers set out to explore uncharted territory, surveying land now home to Buffalo Trace Distillery. Surveyor marks left behind are known as benchmarks and this bourbon whiskey honors their pioneering spirits.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: In 1773, three McAfee Brothers left Virginia westward to explore the uncharted territory that would later become known as Kentucky. Theysurveyed the land now home to the world's most award-winning distillery - Buffalo Trace Distillery. The surveyor marks left behind are known as benchmarks and this bourbon whiskey honors the pioneering spirits of these early American explorers.

description.data:
Hartley is an imported VSOP Brandy is aged in oak casks for four years. The result is an elegant, superior brandy with a complex bouquet of flavor.  

Bright copper in color, Hartley VSOP delights with a rich aroma of fresh buttered rum cake that wafts through the nose. The palate is an opulent smorgasbord of rich fruits. Asian pear, orange peel and juicy apricots drizzled with vanilla shine brightly. The finish is clean and crisp leaving the senses refreshed.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: FRÏS Vodka is distilled four times then Freeze Filtered in sub-zero temperatures to remove any impurities. As a result, FRÏS is a clean, crisp vodka with a smooth taste.

text.data: GOVERNMENT WARNING: (1) ACCORDING TO THE SURGEON GENERAL WOMEN SHOULD NOT DRINK ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES DURING PREGNANCY BECAUSE OF THE RISK OF BIRTH DEFECTS. (2) CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES IMPAIRS YOUR ABILITY TO DRIVE A CAR OR OPERATE MACHINERY, AND MAY CAUSE HEALTH PROBLEMS.

FRÏS isn't your uptown, uptight, up-in-a-fancy-glass kind of vodka. It's the kick-back, grow-into-your-own, no-rules type of spirit. Plus, it's freeze-filtered for maximum smoothness, so it's designed to be served cold and always chill

We stand tall with the purists of having a good time—whatever and wherever that is to you. Curate your own occasion—your way. Just pour up some of "The World's Chillest Vodka" and enjoy an ultra smooth, ultra chill drinking experience
No pretention. No FRÏLLS. Just ultra-modern, ultra-smooth vodka fit for the chillest of times

Since our vodka is made cold, it's best served that way. Drink it in frozen cocktails, serve it chilled, or on the rocks. However you choose, keep it cold and enjoy the chÏll vibes it comes with. Checkout our Facebook for more recipes

brandHighlight.data: Introduced in 1984, Blanton's namesake bourbon was the first ever Single Barrel Bourbon sold commercially. The Single Barrel Bourbon is the first of its kind.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Single Barrel Bourbon started with Blanton's in 1984. Nearing retirement, Master Distiller Elmer T. Lee was tasked with creating a bourbon of exceptionally high quality. With careful reflection, he recalled the earlier days of his career in the late 1940s when he worked under Colonel Albert B. Blanton. Colonel Blanton was the president of the distillery until 1952 As a tribute to Colonel Blanton's old tradition, Elmer T. Lee decided to name this new bourbon "Blanton's Single Barrel".

tastingNotesText.data: Hints of spicy rye and tobacco on the nose, followed by caramel and honey, dark fruit and citrus notes. The palate emulates the same complex aroma with rye, tobacco, and honey. Oak and vanilla contribute to an extremely long and harmonious finish.

description.data: Enjoy a one-of-a-kind spirit at its most laid back with Southern Comfort Original Whiskey. SoCo Original is an easy-drinking whiskey without the overpowering harshness of other whiskeys. Made with traditional American craftsmanship since 1874, Southern Comfort is created following M. W. Heron’s recipe. The tastes of stone fruits and spices combine for a blended whiskey that is smooth and easy-going with that just-right balance of sweetness and spice. Whether you’re trying this 35% alcohol by volume spirit for the first time or enjoying it as a seasoned whiskey drinker, Southern Comfort Original Whiskey is so tasteful every time. SoCo liquor is satisfying neat, on the rocks or as a shot and is equally delicious in your favorite mixed drinks. From a SoCo whiskey sour, an old fashioned or even a maple bacon Manhattan, no other spirit is so tasteful however you drink it or whoever you drink it with. True to the spirit of the Big Easy, Southern Comfort is whiskey on its own terms made to be enjoyed on yours. SoCo. So tasteful.

description.data: Liven up your experience with the exciting flavor of 99 Brand Xxpresso Liqueur. With 27 cordials and growing, 99 is America's #1 cordials brand. These liqueur shots are an amazing way to celebrate the good times and chill vibes. Each bottle of 99 Brand Xxpresso liqueur has zero sugar and per 155 calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 49.5% alcohol, 99 can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle as shots for a burst of tasty espresso flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, 99 Xxpresso tastes great in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mixed drinks. Add a splash to your hard seltzer for a full flavor explosion or combine a shot of this coffee liqueur with other 99 Brand liqueurs, like 99 Whipped, to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store 99 Xxpresso at room temperature or pour it from your freezer for an icy shot. Live life in color with 99 Brand Liqueur. Please drink responsibly.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data:
In pursuit of perfection, we developed Platinum 10X vodka. It is vodka redefined and refined - a perfect balance of taste and design; offered at an accessible price point.

Platinum 10X is crafted under the careful supervision of our experienced distillers. It is distilled an impressive 10 times from high-quality American grain. Utilizing column & pot distillation allows for a more pure distillate that delivers a consistent and smooth drinking experience every time.

tastingNotesText.data: Extravagantly clear color. Crisp and pure with aromas of nougat and custard that slightly tingle the senses with a bold but soft body. The finish is intriguing, inviting, and exhilarating as the tastes slowly fade to a glorious memory.

description.data:
Hartley is an imported VSOP Brandy is aged in oak casks for four years. The result is an elegant, superior brandy with a complex bouquet of flavor.  

Bright copper in color, Hartley VSOP delights with a rich aroma of fresh buttered rum cake that wafts through the nose. The palate is an opulent smorgasbord of rich fruits. Asian pear, orange peel and juicy apricots drizzled with vanilla shine brightly. The finish is clean and crisp leaving the senses refreshed.

brandHighlight.data: Southern Comfort is the original ready-for-anything whiskey. It's been an American icon since 1874. Sip it, mix it, shake it, blend it. Any way you like it. This is whiskey on its own terms. Made to be enjoyed on yours.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Enjoy a one-of-a-kind spirit at its most laid back with Southern Comfort Black Whiskey. SoCo Black is an easy-drinking whiskey that brings unmistakable whiskey flavor without the overpowering harshness of other whiskeys. Made with traditional American craftsmanship since 1874, Southern Comfort is made following M. W. Heron’s recipe. The taste of stone fruits and spices combine for a blended whiskey that is smoky, smooth and bold with that just-right balance of sweetness and spice. Whether you’re trying this 40% alcohol by volume spirit for the first time or enjoying it as a seasoned whiskey drinker, Southern Comfort Black Whiskey is so tasteful every time. SoCo liquor is satisfying neat, on the rocks or as a shot - no fruit required - and is equally delicious in your favorite mixed drinks. From a SoCo whiskey sour or old fashioned to a Southern Manhattan, no other spirit is so tasteful however you drink it or whoever you drink it with. True to the spirit of the Big Easy, Southern Comfort is whiskey on its own terms made to be enjoyed on yours. SoCo. So tasteful.

description.data: Experience distinction and discovery in every sip with Expresiones del Corazon Sazerac Rye Anejo Tequila. Expresiones del Corazon Anejo Tequila is luxury tequila crafted using hand-selected blue agave and time-honored methods. This tequila blanco is aged for 24 months in 18-year Sazerac Rye barrels. The final result is a barrel aged tequila with strong hints of fresh fruit that are met with notes of oak, caramel, almond, chocolate, cinnamon and vanilla. Enjoy the authentic taste of this 90 proof liquor by straight sipping or mixing in a cocktail, such as a tequila old fashioned. Store Expresiones del Corazon Sazerac Rye Anejo Tequila at room temperature or store in the freezer to enjoy this blue agave spirit chilled. Corazon Tequila. Heart Matters.

description.data: Liven up your experience with the exciting flavors of a 99 Brand Liqueur Party Pack. With 27 cordials flavors and growing, 99 is America's #1 cordials brand. These liqueur shots are an amazing way to celebrate the good times and chill vibes. Each bottle of 99 Brand liqueur has zero sugar and 155 calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 49.5% alcohol, 99 can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle as shots for a burst of tasty flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, these liqueurs can be used in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mixed drinks. Add a liqueur shot to your hard seltzer for a full flavor explosion or combine 99 Brand liqueurs to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store 99 at room temperature or pour it from your freezer for an icy shot. Live life in color with 99 Brand Liqueur. Please drink responsibly.

description.data: A superior brandy, exquisitely blended and aged four years in oak. This unique, award winning blend is aged longer to provide an even smoother taste experience with greater complexity and intrigue.

tastingNotesText.data: Sweet and fruity with remarkable cognac characteristics, it isn't until the mid palate where the American oak notes truly emerge. While the oak is clearly there, it isn't overpowering nor does it overwhelm the other flavors including vanilla, caramel, iris, ginger, and raisin. The ginger from the mid palate combines with the oak spice to lead the finish which is slightly spicy, soft, and easy with a sweet and light undertone of caramel and fruit.

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of spicy cinnamon.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is America’s #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

brandHighlight.data: Southern Comfort is the original ready-for-anything whiskey. It's been an American icon since 1874. Sip it, mix it, shake it, blend it. Any way you like it. This is whiskey on its own terms. Made to be enjoyed on yours.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Enjoy a one-of-a-kind spirit at its most laid back with Southern Comfort 100 Whiskey. SoCo 100 is an easy-drinking whiskey with an extra kick and whiskey swagger without the overpowering harshness of other whiskeys. Made with traditional American craftsmanship since 1874, Southern Comfort is made following M. W. Heron’s recipe. The taste of stone fruits and spices combine for a blended whiskey that is smooth and easygoing with that just-right balance of sweetness and spice. Whether you’re trying this 50% alcohol by volume spirit for the first time or enjoying it as a seasoned whiskey drinker, Southern Comfort 100 Whiskey is so tasteful every time. SoCo liquor is satisfying neat, on the rocks or as a shot - no fruit required - and is equally delicious in your favorite mixed drinks. From a SoCo whiskey sour or rosemary old fashioned to a maple bacon Manhattan, no other spirit is so tasteful however you drink it or whoever you drink it with. True to the spirit of the Big Easy, Southern Comfort is whiskey on its own terms made to be enjoyed on yours. SoCo. So tasteful.

Finish: savory with extra whiskey kick

description.data:
Canadian LTD is overseen by Drew Mayville, Sazerac's Master Blender. Mayville has over 40 years of Canadian Whisky making experience with 23 of those years at Seagram's, where he was the fourth and final master blender of the Seagram dynasty. 

Canadian LTD is an 80-proof Canadian whisky that has been aged for three years. Aromas and flavors of maple sugar, vanilla and spice with a dry-yet-fruity medium body and a warm peppery finish. This whisky is wonderful for mixing in numerous cocktails.

description.data: Liven up your experience with the exciting flavor of 99 Brand Mango Liqueur. With 27 cordials and growing, 99 is America's #1 cordials brand. These liqueur shots are an amazing way to celebrate the good times and chill vibes. Each bottle of 99 Brand Mango liqueur has zero sugar and 155 calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 49.5% alcohol, 99 can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle as shots for a burst of tasty mango flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, 99 Mangoes tastes great in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mixed drinks. Add a splash to your hard seltzer for a full flavor explosion or combine this mango liqueur shot with other 99 Brand liqueurs, like 99 Pineapples, to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store 99 Mango at room temperature or pour it from your freezer for an icy shot. Live life in color with 99 Brand Liqueur. Please drink responsibly.

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of hot spicy cinnamon. Live it, shoot it, what happens next is up to you. Tastes like heaven but the fire burn is hot and harsh. Red Hot! Why not make every Friday a Fireball Friday? Drink it straight as a shot or mix it up with pineapple juice, ginger beer and a squeeze of lime for a Fiery Mule! Literally the only thing you need to get your party started!

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is America’s #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

description.data: This is a whisky well deserving of its moniker, Rich & Rare Reserve. It comes from a full-bodied blend of hand-selected reserve barrel whiskeys that are brilliantly intermingled.

tastingNotesText.data:
The initial sip shows the complex luxury of berries drizzled with mocha and
caramel. A zesty explosion drenches the palette with a wonderful seasoning merger of wood and rye grain blending with tangy dark fruits.
The finish is a lively two step of rich sweetness and the zing of rye, twinkling down the taste buds.

brandHighlight.data: 1792 is made with our signature "high-rye" mashbill at the oldest continually operating distillery in Bardstown, KY - the Bourbon Capital of the World.1792 is positioned for those who are successful and ambitious, with good taste.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Elevating whiskey to new heights, 1792 Small Batch Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whiskey is an award-winning whiskey that is sophisticated and complex. 1792 bourbon is created at the oldest fully operating distillery in Bardstown, Kentucky, the heart of bourbon country. This distinctly different bourbon whiskey features an expressive and elegant flavor profile. Unmistakable spice notes mingle with sweet caramel and vanilla for a bourbon that’s incomparably brash and bold yet smooth and balanced. The bourbon is made from 1792’s signature high rye recipe aged in select barrels carefully chosen by our master distiller. This small batch whiskey is 93.7 proof. Enjoy 1792 bourbon whiskey on the rocks, neat, or in your favorite whiskey cocktails, such as an old fashioned or Manhattan. Raise a glass to raised expectations with 1792 Bourbon Whiskey.

tastingNotesText.data:
Complex nose with classic bourbon notes of smooth vanilla, sweet caramel and deep oak. 
On the palate, bold rye spice mingles with dark fruit and sweet caramel 
The finish is long and lingering, with hints of cocoa

brandHighlight.data: Fireball Cinnamon Whisky needs no introduction. Just imagine what it feels like to stand face-to-face with a fire-breathing dragon who just ate a whisky barrel full of spicy cinnamon

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Free Your Fire with the heavenly taste and ferocious burn of Fireball Cinnamon Whisky. Fireball is the perfectly blended Canadian whisky made with real cinnamon for a fiery kick of red hot cinnamon flavor. Fireball is America’s #1 shot brand and #1 whiskey brand, making this cinnamon whisky the iconic choice for celebrating with friends at home or your favorite bar. At 33% alcohol by volume, a Fireball shot is the perfect whiskey shot for pregaming before a chill night out. Fireball Canadian Whisky also tastes great when enjoyed straight or added to your favorite mixed drinks or a classic cocktail. The cinnamon flare of Fireball hard liquor also enhances your favorite hard seltzer, hard cider and other alcoholic drinks. With countless ways to enjoy Fireball Cinnamon Whisky, bending the rules is easy - and delicious. Store Fireball at room temperature or store and pour straight from your freezer to enjoy an icy, spicy shot. Fireball is one of a kind, not to be replaced by any other copycat cinnamon whiskey. Fireball tastes like heaven and burns like hell.

tastingNotesText.data: The flavor of Fireball is unlike anything else. Even other cinnamon whiskies are difficult to compare. The drink goes down smooth, and as the branding will have you know, it's fiery. It's warming in the belly and flavorful on the tongue. You'll get the flavor of a cinnamon candy with all the spicy and sweet tones that you've always loved.

brandHighlight.data: Introduced in 1984, Blanton's namesake bourbon was the first ever Single Barrel Bourbon sold commercially. The Single Barrel Bourbon is the first of its kind.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Single Barrel Bourbon started with Blanton's in 1984. Nearing retirement, Master Distiller Elmer T. Lee was tasked with creating a bourbon of exceptionally high quality. With careful reflection, he recalled the earlier days of his career in the late 1940s when he worked under Colonel Albert B. Blanton. Colonel Blanton was the president of the distillery until 1952 As a tribute to Colonel Blanton's old tradition, Elmer T. Lee decided to name this new bourbon "Blanton's Single Barrel".

tastingNotesText.data: A deep, satisfying nose of nutmeg and spices. Powerful dry vanilla notes in harmony with hints of honey amid strong caramel and corn. A medium finish composed of returning corn and nutmeg flavors.

description.data: Liven up your experience with the exciting flavor of 99 Brand Cinnamon Liqueur. With 27 cordials and growing, 99 is America's #1 cordials brand. This liqueur is an amazing way to celebrate the good times and chill vibes. Each bottle of 99 Brand Cinnamon liqueur has zero sugar and per 155 calories per 1.5 ounce shot. At 49.5% alcohol, 99 can be enjoyed straight out of the bottle as shots for a burst of tasty cinnamon flavor. Perfect for any party or celebration with friends, 99 Cinnamon tastes great in a multitude of spectacular alcoholic beverages, cocktails and mixed drinks. Add a splash to your hard seltzer for a full flavor explosion or combine a shot of this cinnamon liqueur with other 99 Brand liqueurs, like 99 Apples, to make a variety of delicious alcoholic beverages. Store 99 Cinnamon at room temperature or pour it from your freezer for an icy shot. Live life in color with 99 Brand Liqueur. Please drink responsibly.

description.data:
Canadian LTD is overseen by Drew Mayville, Sazerac's Master Blender. Mayville has over 40 years of Canadian Whisky making experience with 23 of those years at Seagram's, where he was the fourth and final master blender of the Seagram dynasty. 

Canadian LTD is an 80-proof Canadian whisky that has been aged for three years. Aromas and flavors of maple sugar, vanilla and spice with a dry-yet-fruity medium body and a warm peppery finish. This whisky is wonderful for mixing in numerous cocktails.

brandHighlight.data: Parrot Bay is a premium merge of fresh, rich flavors with a light, crisp Caribbean rum. This rum is designed to envelop your senses and transport you to your own pitstop in paradise.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Escape from the day-to-day grind of life with Parrot Bay Pineapple Rum. You can never go wrong with the delectable mixture of rich Caribbean white rum and the sweet, tropical taste of natural pineapple. Whether you're enjoying the latest season of your favorite show or vibing with your friends, open up a bottle of pineapple flavored rum to indulge in the delicious flavors to savor your own mini staycation. Parrot Bay rum is 21% alcohol by volume for a drink you can enjoy neat or on the rocks. To make your personal tropical escape even more exciting, use Parrot Bay Pineapple Rum liquor in mixed drinks and cocktails, whether it’s a pina colada, mai tai, daiquiri or Parrot Bay Pineapple Splash. Store Parrot Bay Pineapple Rum at room temperature or keep it in your freezer for a chilled burst of tropical flavor. Trade the everyday for Parrot Bay.

tastingNotesText.data: Caribbean rum with natural Pineapple flavors. Parrot Bay Pineapple is a legendary blend of Caribbean rich white rum, sweet pineapple, and exotic tropic fruit.

One 750ml plastic bottle of Parrot Bay Pineapple Rum, 42 Proof
Enjoy a burst of tropical taste thanks to the delicious, natural pineapple flavor and rich Caribbean white rum
Try this rum neat, in mixed drinks or in cocktails, like a pina colada, mai tai, daiquiri or a Parrot Bay Pineapple Splash
At 21% alcohol by volume, this flavored rum that is nice and gentle as a beach breeze and feels fresh on your palate
Store Parrot Bay rum at room temperature for anytime paradise or keep it chilled in your freezer for an ice cold drink and chill vibes
Trade the everyday for Parrot Bay

flavorStatement.data: Caribbean rum with natural Pineapple flavors. Parrot Bay Pineapple is a legendary blend of Caribbean rich white rum, sweet pineapple, and exotic tropic fruit.

brandHighlight.data: Platinum 7X delivers an American-made vodka with a smooth, clean and crisp style. With great care and meticulous attention to detail, the Platinum team has been able to craft a truly exceptional vodka.

text.data: Store in cool dry place or refrigerate after opening

description.data: Established in 1996, top-selling Platinum 7X delivers an American-made vodka with a smooth, clean and crisp style. With great care and meticulous attention to detail, the Platinum team has been able to craft a truly exceptional vodka, winning back-to-back Gold Medals at the San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Distilled seven times from American corn for exceptional purity and a consistently smooth finish, Platinum 7X is perfect for sipping chilled or mixing in cocktails.

Established in 1996, Platinum 7X was first conceived to deliver an American-made vodka with a smooth, clean and crisp style. With great care and meticulous detail, the Platinum team has been able to craft something truly exceptional
